body:
Hi Kirk,


The mesh primitive is the best and easiest way to get UV texture  
coordinates into Radiance.  See "Fitting texture to mesh" thread from  
Oct. 2003:


	http://www.radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003- 
October/001029.html


-Greg
